A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After seeing TFA\, a recycled new hope\, my expectations coming in were already low. After decades of fans waiting for Luke’s return\, It was a total failure around Disney to not do more with him in this movie. Somehow\, which is not surprising\, the story loses focus with what was suppose to built around Episode 7. I gave it 1.5 stars just because they brought back puppet Yoda.
